summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a Memorandum of Understanding amending the collective bargaining agreement between The City of Seattle and the Joint Crafts Council and its affiliate, International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers, Hope Lodge No. 79, as the representative of certain City Employees concerning the wages paid former employee Gerald B. Dixon from September 1 to December 31, 1978, and authorizing payment of an adjustment therefor.
